channel.title: [TUT] How to change what the npc's shout out (e.g welcome to whatever) [317]
channel.description:
hello im using allstar-scape base for starter on coding so far i only know very little as i am new here.
this is a very short and simple guide to follow shouldn't be to hard.
~Tutorial~
1.ok go into NPChandler.java (may be diffrent for you) then press "ctrl+h" together then a pannel should open.
2.now on top line put in the message they currently shout and on bottom line put the message you would like them to say (might be diffrent messages for other npc's) then click "replace all" button on the right side of the pannel.
3.save and compile and run the server and it should work :)
hope this helped :D

@darkangel996 wrote:

hello im using allstar-scape base for starter on coding so far i only know very little as i am new here.

this is a very short and simple guide to follow shouldn’t be to hard.

~Tutorial~

1.ok go into NPChandler.java (may be diffrent for you) then press “ctrl+h” together then a pannel should open.

2.now on top line put in the message they currently shout and on bottom line put the message you would like them to say (might be diffrent messages for other npc’s) then click “replace all” button on the right side of the pannel.

3.save and compile and run the server and it should work

hope this helped
